comment: This was a good class to take. Ensure your discussion posts are within the grading rubric and pay attention to the quizzes.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment:
he will never give you a 100 even if you follow every direction on the rubric. he will give positive feedback, but still take points off. 

gotten a 90 or less for every DISCUSSION when every requirement is met. 

the type of professor that thinks nothing is perfect even when it is.

The class is extremely easy, since it is a summer course he posts two modules per week. He does act like we don't have a life outside of school based on how heavy his workload is sometimes, but it is easy stuff. Exams are easy and can be looked on quizlet, quizzes are pretty easy too. Overall, it is a good class and not difficult at all.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I do not know why this professors ratings are so low. I was scared to take him due to his ratings, but I am so glad I did. Weekly quizzes that you can find the answers to on quizlet, weekly discussion post, 5 SPSS labs, and 2 short research proposals . TAKE HIM!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: This is a difficult and boring class anyways, but he makes it 10x worse. He either really hates me or just grades really harshly. I have him online and we have discussions every week, quizzes, a research project, & SPSS labs. contradicts himself. says he wants in text citations then takes points off cause its 'hard to read with the intxtcitation'

Easy A class. Gove you forty points of extra credit. Discussions every week. Two tests that are essay questions. Other than that there are no other assignments in the class besides a cybercrime project that is so easy! Take him. Easy A. Got over a 100 in the class even without the extra credit!

I took him online for 2 classes. These classes were too much work. I have a full time job and full time school and this has never been an issue before. Most of the work took me at least 2 days to complete and turn in. The Quizzes were not in the correct chapters i studied before the test. Discussions needed to have sources.

I am currently enrolled in the class, and I like him so far. I am also taking his online class though, so I am not sure how different his in person class is. So far so good, he sends us weekly reminders (sometimes twice) on what he expects that week and when it's due. A couple of times I have had questions and he has gotten right back to me

I was skeptical because of the poor reviews but needed to take the course.  I have been pleasantly surprised.  The weekly quizzes are MC and if you have at least glanced through the chapter then you will be fine.  Two major assignments, a Midterm, and a Final, plus discussion (one original & one response).  Honestly not unreasonable.

I have no idea why this man became a teacher at all, when you go to him for help or asking him to clarify his discussion questions he just brushes it off. Also, over half the class failed the first test, he needs to reevaluate his career choice and stop screwing students over!
ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!!! HE IS NOT CLEAR AT ALL. HE MAKES NO SENSE. WHAT HE WANTS IS DIFFERENT FROM THE QUESTION THAT IS ASKED. I'M NOT SURE WHY HE IS EVEN HERE.

He's a nice guy but horrible teacher. You can't understand a word he says and he practically whispers and I sat in the front row and could barely hear him half the time. All assignments are online so it is and easy A. Just make sure you go to class for attendance points.You'll be bored to death but its and easy grade.
VERY HARD TO UNDERSTAND!! Did not state discussion question clearly.

Really a terrible teacher. 3 grades for entire course. I went into the final with an A. Left with a C. I can't understand him or his directions. My 2nd C in 3 years. Awful, awful teacher. Doesn't understand technology either. Can't  un-mute a video.

Very hard to understand due to his accent. Comes off as a nice guy and I'm sure he is. However, he wont talk to you about grades/class unless you meet with him at his office during office hours. Attendance mandatory. Tests and quizzes are online. Powerpoint lectures online as well, you will need the book. Nice guy but would not take again.

Do not take this professor. He is VERY hard to understand, goes off on rants, hardly teaches the subject, and gets angry when students do not respond to him. The subject itself is difficult and he makes it much more worse. The only good thing about his teaching is that tests are all on D2L and group discussions are easy.
